root.str: Used to unlock new class and vehicle options
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 210 rounds.
Applies a decal to your armor. NC use only.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Rank 100 Hood Ornament. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 6 rounds.
Adds Hubcaps NC005 to your Flash. (DNT)

Activate consuming 1000 cortium and for the next 15 seconds main cannon shots do 32% more damage, fly 50% faster and can pierce vehicles. Each shot however will overheat the weapon's cooling system inflicting up to 1000 damage to the Colossus.
Cannot activate while deployed.
The objective is under VS control!
The Radar Scrambler disables nearby enemy's minimaps.
Allows soldiers to carry additional magazines for both their primary and sidearm weapons

<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> You've assisted the cause by punishing our enemies and our technicians indicate they've received the power they need for the next phase. More work still needs to be done before we can utilize this power, but we are one step closer to expanding our understanding. Thank you for your assistance, Enlightened One.
Unable to capture point while in an observer camera.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.
Adds Hubcaps NC002 to your Sunderer. (DNT)

Foster, the NS representative on Sanctuary, has been missing since the attacks on the Containment Site. Nanite Systems has reached out to trusted assets to aid in tracking down their missing employee before he comes to harm.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Scythe to 21 minutes.
Activate to repair 20% of the MAX's health over 12 seconds. Can be activated once every 54 seconds.
Applies a camo to your armor. VS use only.
艾美瑞什 Hearts Armor Camo
Apply the Indar Highlands v2 camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.
Apply the single use Rocky Tundra camo pattern to your armor. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Kill enemy players as a Heavy Assault.
Orphaned - Post Launch - Do not translate. Increases the inertial dampening of the aircraft.
No new message of the day...

The containment facilities house the latest in Nanite Systems' research into the aftermath of the Shattered Warpgate, which could lead to significant advancements in technology and medicine. The Terran Republic has issued orders to reinforce efforts to control these facilities and the information held within.
The Mosquito is a the Terran Republic's one-man fighter. This aircraft the quickest and most agile of all the empire-specific fighters.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. NC use only.
Small explosive device that is projected by the user.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 84 rockets.
We're losing this! Focus out there!
Adds 5 rounds to the default magazine size.
Holographic laser reflex sight designed to create a lightweight, yet accurate, sight
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 31 shells.
This white laser sight increases the weapon's hipfire accuracy by 33%.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> I am told that the contract requires you to proceed to one of the containment facilities on Esamir. There you will assist the faction's war effort by any means necessary.
Celebrate 7 years of war on Auraxis with these special items!

Nanite Systems researchers fear that future warpgate-destroying events may occur outside of Esamir. To collect data and curb the researchers' growing concerns, NS has opened a contract for combat trained pilots to deploy data collection buoys across the war-torn continents.
Apply the Cells camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only.

When activated, the vehicle is encased in a coating that allows it to slip through enemy gate shields and avoid damage caused by collisions with other vehicles. Lasts 15 seconds. Can be activated once every 47 seconds.

The SVA-88's overclocked discharge coil allows it to fire plasma at a higher velocity than most weapons in its class. When firing at long distances, the user will need to lead targets much less than usual. VS use only.
Relics on your HUD and map will become capturable when timer expires.
<font color="#00FFAA">Hadley:</font> That was some excellent detective work you did out there, soldier. Perhaps not as action-packed as you're used to, but valuable none-the-less.
It's the courteous thing to do. All factions can use this gear.
Apply the Lightning Strike camo pattern to your armor. VS use only.
Detects the movement of hostile soldiers near the vehicle and reveals them on the mini-map for all vehicle occupants.
Gravity pads can move you up and down quickly. Just step on the pad and you'll ascend or descend in the direction of the flowing particles.
Apply the single use Indar Highlands v1 camo pattern to your armor. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Press [%s] to use colossus VR terminal
Apply the 艾美瑞什 Forest camo pattern to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the top speed of the Vanguard by 4 KPH.
Contains a AF-41 Hacksaw plus 1000 Certs
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 360 rounds.
Vehicle terminals are where you can create your own vehicles for your use.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 60 rounds.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.1 seconds.

Drifter Jumpjets allow the user to safely glide across long distances for up to 7 seconds. The initial thrust consumes a significant amount of fuel, but can be tapped repeatedly to clear low walls and small buildings.
Adds 19 rounds to the default magazine size.
Chrome-colored variation of the standard laser sight.
Sitrep failed! The current region is not capturable by your faction.

Alright, soldier. Time to put that training to use. Wipe out the hostiles, capture their bases, and defend our own. Your prowess on the battlefield will contribute to your overall Battle Rank, look alive.
Hold to hack enemy terminals. This will deny the terminals to the enemy while allowing your own team to use them.
We can't prove that people who buy Membership to support PS2 are happier people, but we can't disprove it either.
Attach an underbarrel shotgun to your weapon
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your Engineer. TR use only.
NC - Auto-Pistol - Mid - V2 Description(Delete Me -BB)

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Emerson:</font> As a baseline, all of our Nanite Systems Operatives... just NSO, for short, are assigned through long-standing requisition contracts with the three main factions. You don't normally get to pick who you represent, and chances are you'll be fighting for the underdogs.
Damage or destroy enemy aircraft with any ground based weaponry.
Increases the top speed of the Scythe by 16 KPH.
Increases the time it takes to lock-on to the vehicle by 0.75 seconds and prevents the vehicle from automatically appearing to hostiles based on proximity or radar detection.
Adds lightning trails to the Chimera's wheels. NSO only. <font color="#dc9c36">Color of trail changes based on your current faction.</font>
Wearable by all classes. NC use only.
Increases the vehicle's total health pool by 28%.
Apply this helmet to your MAX. VS use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 8.75%

<font color="#00FFAA">Supply Coordinator:</font> The supplies didn't make it to their destination on time, going to have to mark this one down as a failure. I'll contact you again when we start forming up for another run.
Improved traction, turning, brakes, and reverse speed.
An imposing set of horns for a helmet.
Attaches a 1.75x optical zoom to your weapon.
Apply the Lightning Strike camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only.
The 150mm Cannon Tank Destroyer is used by New Conglomerate to seek out and destroy enemy tanks
I see you've located one of our vehicles. Disperse the charge, reactivate the vehicle, and bring it back to our Warpgate.
Recruiter Rewards Experience and Resource Boost
Use your movement keys to move forward, backward, and sidestep to the left or to the right.

This is a capture training mission, soldier. Each base is controlled by one or more capture points. These capture points will change control once you've cleared away nearby enemies, and are standing within the capture area. Enable tracking on this mission and we'll highlight the closest enemy capture point on your map and HUD. Stand near the capture point to contribute to your team's control over it. This will be difficult to do alone, so work with your team to take control of the enemy base.
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 4.5% every 5 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.

Creates a smoke screen around the vehicle which prevents you and nearby allied vehicles from automatically showing on minimap radar, and prevents lock-on attempts for 8 seconds. Can be used once every 35 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 405 rounds.
Applies a decal to your armor. TR use only.
Pinning a Mission to your HUD will show more detailed information, including objective waypoints for many mission types.
Apply the Shard camo pattern to your armor. NC use only.
TR - Pistol - Mid - V4 Description(Delete Me -BB)
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 400 rounds.
Customize your Sunderer and tear up the roads of Auraxis with these tire spikes. All factions can use this gear.
Press [%s] to toggle the energy bridge
Activate to reduce incoming damage to the front and top armor by 67% and the side armor by 34% for 8 seconds. Can be activated once every 53 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 5 shells.
White Lumifiber Digital Trim for the Valkyrie. TR use only.
You will automatically be placed in your vehicle.
Apply the Urban Forest camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only.
Increases the size of the Nano-Efficient Cloak's capacitor.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 100 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 8 missiles.
Lightning Grenade only works if it is inside an Esamir Electric storm 2 seconds after being thrown.
Applies a banner to your character. TR use only.
This customization adds a VS Logo decal to the cockpit glass. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 250 rounds.
NS35 Frag Cannon Left Copper Medal
Remain within 100m of an allied convoy vehicle to receive mission credit.
<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> Our scientists have identified a signal near what's left of that Shattered Warpgate. We need you to track down the source, soldier.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 280 rounds.
Press and hold Spot ("R1" by default) while looking at an ally to open a quick-action menu.
The LAV-LG can lock onto ground vehicles to fire a homing missile, or be dumbfired when the situations calls for it. NSO use only.
This customization adds a VS Logo decal to the cockpit glass. VS use only.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. TR use only.
Adds blue chassis lights to the under carriage of the Harasser. VS use only.
The Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. NC use only.
Kill enemies as a vehicle gunner

Satellite scans show ANTs from every faction creating makeshift bases throughout Auraxis. We must prevent our enemies from establishing a foothold by destroying their construction sites and replacing them with bases of our own.
NC: MAX: Flame 01: Right Silver Medal
Increases the efficiency of the MAX's JS236 capacitor allowing it to recharge at a faster rate.
Heavy Assault: Kill 50 players over 100m away
Increases the vertical thrust speed of the Liberator by 3KPH.
Could not join because invitation did not come from the platoon leader.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 6.25%
This powerful energy source is placed into the chassis of a Victory Generator, allowing it to draw power directly from enemy Warp Gates.
Changes the quality of textures. Higher qualities may require more RAM.

Underbarrel smoke grenade launcher attachment; increases the equip time of the attached weapon.

Pressing Gear Slot 1 hotkey will toggle the attachment.
Large bulkhead doors sealed by magnetic locks. Hack the nearby console to disengage the locks.
Rapidly locks on to and destroys ground-based vehicles
Friendly asleep on the job? Wake them up with this horn!
Earn this service ribbon by killing enemies
Attaches a Charged Proton II 60mm Mortar to the Plasma Cannon. 60mm Mortar cannons fire explosive rounds with large blast areas that are most effective against infantry targets.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 3 shells.
Applies a camo to your armor. TR use only.
Applies a camo to your character. VS use only.
You have been removed from the vehicle queue because you moved too far from the vehicle terminal.
The Adrenaline Pump increases sprint speed while equipped.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 60 rounds.
Increases the lifespan of the Ammunition Pack to 3 minutes; also increases the radius in which the pack will resupply ammo to 4 meters.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 50 ms.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 180 rounds.
We need more platoon leaders capable of tactical thinking. With at least 23 soldiers under your command, capture bases from the enemy, and defend our territories as well.
<font color="#00FFAA">Malfunctioning Spy Drone:</font> Update, B0nuxCh3k3r. Download currently 20% complete. Continue to prevent interruptions.
This customization adds a Tan decal to the cockpit glass. NC use only.
Feel the love with this limited time mega sale bundle!
Target range is displayed on your crosshair, and enemy explosives within 18 meters are automatically spotted.<font color="#dc9c36"> Works in ground vehicles. MAX units can equip.</font>
Apply the Indar Dry Ocean camo pattern to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. VS use only.
Orphaned - Post Launch - Do not translate. Liberator Inertial Dampener - Level 4
If you reload while there are still rounds in the magazine you will do a faster reload.
Is your Republic the shepherd, or the wolf?
艾美瑞什's lush groves and rocky outcroppings provide ample cover between its rolling plains and mountain passes.
This weapon cannot be fired underwater.

Greetings once more, acolyte. Based on the data you've provided, we have confirmed that the collapse of the Northeastern Warpgate has, indeed, been the cause of the weather abnormalities in the region.
Could not transfer fireteam leadership due to bad subgroup ID.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. NC use only.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 200 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.
Upgrades the Medical Applicator to heal the Combat Medic while healing or reviving others
Liberator Clip Size TR PH 01: Increases magazine by blah
Kill five enemies of the Vanu with your Beamer.
Adds 1 round to the default magazine size.
The duration the cloak can remain active is increased to 8.5 seconds and the charge time when depleted is decreased to 11 seconds; additionally the small arms damage resist is increased to 35%.
Ammunition Packages can be deployed by Engineers to resupply the ammunition of any friendly soldiers nearby.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 140 rounds.

Representative Foster

An unassuming black pistol rests on the large, polished desk, as if part of the decor. He folded his hands neatly.
"May I offer you a drink?" I declined.
An assistant leaves the room and shuts the door quietly behind her.
"I understand the position you are in now may seem unfavorable, but I'd ask you to keep in mind who your creditors were prior." A lump formed in my throat.
"After you have completed the program, your debts will be forgiven. Your family will be looked after in the event that you fail." I glanced down at the papers in front of me.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 420 rounds.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. TR use only.
External Fuel Tanks increase the rate in which afterburner fuel is replenished. Further ranks will also increase fuel capacity.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.48 seconds.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "2" Hood Ornament.
Allows the Infiltrator to equip IFF Grenades
The remarkable engineering of the powerful MC2 Nailstorm has caused it to be referred to as "the TR's mobile turret."

<font color="#00FFAA">Hadley</font> Alright, alright. That should be enough cores outta you. Some of your pals are out in the field harvesting too, if you want to lighten the load. I'll be in Sanctuary when you're ready to move on.
Imminent success is all but assured.
While wielded, the Amaterasu can strike enemies at a distance using crescent wave technology, the trade-off is that it is less capable than traditional knives for piercing infantry protective gear.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 70 rounds.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. NC use only.
Apply the Carbonation camo pattern to your armor. TR use only.
Reduces damage taken from small arms and heavy machine guns by 20%.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34:</font> You go hand him this data and make sure he remembers who got it for him. I mean me. Also you, but mostly me.
Improves the ability of the Vanguard to manuever in combat by improving rotation speed, brake power, and reverse speed.
Reduces minimum cone of fire and cone of fire recovery time.
Squad: Hack 50 facilities while in a Platoon

In 2866 Nanite Systems released robotic operatives whose husks are controlled remotely and contracted to the highest bidder. Each empire treats these temporary soldiers with no shortage of unease, as they can never be certain what orders have been given, or who is behind the mask.

NSO characters are only available to players above Battle Rank 20.
These characters are assigned to fight for the lowest populated empire on the continent.

Membership subscribers may choose to align with and fight for one empire. This alliance also allows members to join outfits within that empire. Members can change their empire alliance at any time in the Sanctuary.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.36 seconds.
Use an ANT to deposit Cortium into an allied Silo near Staging Sites on Esamir
Fire any weapon as a Light Assault
Nanite based tool specialized to repair organic material.
TR: MAX: Flame 01: Left Auraxium Medal
<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Great job, soldier. The check is in the mail.
Discover this Codex Entry from Chapter 01
TR Patriot Flare Gun Copper Medal
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Emerson:</font> Those elite status members are also able to join an Outfit from the empire they're assigned to. Helps with unit cohesion, and it makes Nanite Systems look good, too.
Primary weapon turret for the Vanguard. Operated by the tank driver.
Celebrate PlanetSide 2's fourth anniversary with even more loot! You get the weapons, camo, and decal, plus Heavy Assault armor for all 3 Empires, and the fabled ACCOUNT WIDE 6 month heroic boost!
You were removed from the squad.
Deposit Cortium into a Silo near Staging Sites

The Butcher gained its reputation as a fearsome weapon capable of unending, long-range suppressive fire following a series of extended engagements at The Crown. Built on the CARV platform, the Butcher's notoriety has been earned over time in blood.
Customize your Flash with this glowing antenna ball. TR use only.
Unlock various gadgets for the Reaver's Utility slot. Utility slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Reduces the duration of Concussion, Flash, and EMP Grenades used against you by 45%. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>

Deploys a dependable Snowman to stand watch over your base.

Only available during Auraximas.
Allows the use of low rocket-assisted jumps with a short cooldown.
Customize your Flash with this white blinking antenna ball. TR use only.
Adds a bumper to your Magrider. VS use only.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Reaver to 15 minutes.
Upgrades the Medical Applicator to heal the Combat Medic while healing others
Available as part of the Fourth Anniversary Bundle, this decal can be applied to vehicles and is unique to each faction.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. NC use only.
Small explosive device that is projected by the user.
The Harasser must be acquired from a Warpgate Ground Vehicle Terminal for it to have the messages.
Help us help you. And help yourself. Help us help you help yourself.
the owner has set the vehicle to squad only
An old-war standard issue Vanu acolyte helmet, classic in design and function. VS use only.
You can try out all weapons, certifications, and cosmetics for free in the VR Training Room; use a Warpgate Terminal to access it.
Failed to join channel: Invalid password or access denied

<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Huh? Guess there wasn't enough juice to assemble the aircraft. It did give us a loose location on the researcher who escaped the flooded base. And that location is on Oshur. Take to the skies and find them.
<font color="#00FFAA">Hadley:</font> We just added one more location to your map. The signature is a lot bigger than the others, but not as strong. Check this last area out before returning.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 560 rounds.2857542205 ucdn

A problem has been detected with your Planetside 2 installation. Please re-run Launchpad, click Advanced Tools and perform "Validate Game Assets." Go to http://help.daybreakgames.com/ for more information.
To create a Platoon you must have 3 people and select a squad member other than yourself.

The Command Center is necessary for participation in Outfit Wars. Once built, the outfit can then qualify for the next outfit war.If the outfit does not qualify, the command center will need to be crafted again.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.5 seconds.
Customize your Flash with this glowing antenna ball. NC use only.
Proficiency with the Light Assault class.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 64 grenades.
Attaches a Proton II 60mm Mortar to the Plasma Cannon. 60mm Mortar cannons fire explosive rounds with large blast areas that are most effective against infantry targets.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.24 seconds.

Nicknamed for their usage, these "Locklets" have short-range lockon functionality for enemy vehicles, but lack the dumbfire and burst-fire capabilities of the standard ACE rocklets. <font color="#dc9c36"></br>Flak detonation.</br>Required Lockon: Aircraft or Armor</font>
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "N" Hood Ornament.
Interact with Bio Lab consoles as a Heavy Assault
Customize your Flash with this glowing antenna ball. TR use only.
This customization adds a White decal to the cockpit glass. TR use only.
Celebrate the legacy of PlanetSide with this Forseral themed bundle! This bundle contains weapons for all factions, and cosmetics for VS, NC, and TR.
The Prowler defensive certification 'Reinforced Front Armor' has been removed. Spent certifications have been refunded.
Apply the Pumpkin Patch camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only.
Adds red chassis lights to the under carriage of the Vanguard.
FREEDOM THRUSTERS have been disabled, as the holiday has ended.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 12.
When an empire has domination over a continent, that continent will become unavailable for combat. If a new continent is locked, the oldest locked continent will unlock.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Liberator by 720 seconds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> This was left by members of the Nascent Expeditions advance team. I'll contact their supervisors for leaving an open flame, but there's no need for us to worry about it.
Increases the number of medical kits that can be carried to 2.
Customize your Flash with this purple antenna ball. NC use only.
Certs spent on the Valkyrie's Squad Logistics System have been refunded, and squad-spawn has been integrated by default.
Deployable location does not meet mission placement requirements.

The storms on Esamir have made providing logistical support and reinforcements to our troops in the field a nightmare. We can't let some inconvenient inclement weather stop us from taking and holding bases, so we need a pilot that isn't afraid of a little static electricity to fly into the storm and drop-off our soldiers.
Adds 8 rounds to the default magazine size.
Increases the vehicle's total health pool by 10%.
Adds festive light trails to the vehicle's wheels. VS use only.
Nanite Systems' ACRA-4 has a 4x zoom range which provides the user with better clarity on mid-range targets.

Originally developed for exploration on Esamir as a companion tool to the NS Icebreaker, the Firebug has recently gained popularity among soldiers looking for a more dramatic option in close-quarters combat.
The Phased Dispersion Amplifier increases the number of pellets fired by 1 while reducing the weapon's rate of fire by 50%.
Get the most popular Lightning weapons at a discounted price!
Adds a bumper to your Vanguard. NC use only.
Early versions of the AR-100 boasted faster refire rates, but less precise handling, a critique often cited when combat unit deactivations would occur.
Grenades can be resupplied at equipment terminals and cost nanites.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 140 rounds.
Customize your Magrider with Chrome Carapace Plating. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 64 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 54.
Adds pulsing cosmetic propulsion effects to this vehicle. VS use only.
Replaces the user's shield with a secondary health bar.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34:</font> You head on over to Hossin. I'll be in touch.
<font color="#00FFAA">Umatherin:</font> With the lesser factions contaminating the region, we must act with haste to advance our efforts. We have provided you specific missions to further our will.
Have some creepy organ music to accompany your phantom-esque drive-bys.
The Illuminated Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. NC use only.
Failed to disband squad due to bad player group.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Gold Robgoblin Hood Ornament.
Earn points by holding Ti Alloys, The Crown, Ceres Hydroponics, Crossroads Watchtower, Seabed Listening Post, The Palisade, or Snake Ravine Lookout.
Applies a decal to your armor. VS use only.
Bring joy to your enemies before you destroy them with this festive Holiday Song horn. All factions can use this gear.
Apply the single use Pine Forest camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.

<font color="#00FFAA">Campner:</font> There are also notes on nearby locations. Vanu constructs? They are listed as giving off an unusual energy signature. Anything of alien origin is worth investigating. I have marked their positions on your map.
Reduces the delay before a depleted overshield begins recharging by 100%, and active overshields drain energy 30% slower while stationary. <font color="#dc9c36">Heavy Assault only.</font>
Kills from a Flash while wearing a Halloween Mask or Helmet.
Adds spectral cosmetic propulsion effects to this vehicle. TR use only.
Kill enemies by running over them or earn ram bonuses while in a Flash.
Squad will redeploy into drop pods at Steel Rain location in 30 seconds
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 950 rounds.

Warpgates remain unstable while populations are low. </br></br>Unstable continents cannot be conquered, and less regions are capable of being captured. </br></br>The unpowered bases will come back online once the continent reaches a minimum viable population count.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.12 seconds.
Could not set fireteam flags because you are not the squad leader.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 12 rounds.
Increases the MAXes fire rate for a short period of time.
<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Welcome to the Containment Site, operative. The extent of damage is unknown. Please investigate the facility prior to starting repairs.
Integrated storage cells increase maximum fuel by 30% for most jump jet types. Ambusher Jump Jets regenerate fuel 10% faster.
Apply the single use 艾美瑞什 Forest v2 camo pattern to your armor.
Earn a kill, kill assist, or gunner kill on a Deliverer, Lodestar, or Wasp Prototype.
Applies a banner to your character. NC use only.
This activates projectile shields over Amp Stations, Tech Plants and outposts.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 5%.
Holographic laser reflex sight designed to create a lightweight, yet accurate, sight
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 180 rounds.
A streamlined airframe allows the Liberator to perform more precise manuevers by improving its turn rate, roll rate, and airbrake power.
The [*faction*] only needs [*points*] to trigger a meltdown!

While deployed, shares the locations of enemy infantry within 40 meters every 1.5 seconds; the Infiltrator also receives live movement updates of enemies within 20 meters. Lasts 180 seconds, three can be carried.
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> Our business partners on Hossin own relevant information, but they have been less inclined to share. It's a shame, given the impending chaos sure to unfold.
<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Ayla:</font> For the time being, I'm overseeing access to the embassies... It's been pretty quiet so far.
Roadkills with a Flash or Harasser will restore 33% base turbo energy.

The demand for Auraxium remains high even after the completion of the Containment Facilities on Esamir. Nascent Expeditions, allied with the Terran Republic, issue contracts for any soldier willing to collect the crystals unearthed by their monstrous Elysium Drills.
